page.title: 14Leisure Time (Adults).
page.content: The Ferguson's enjoy Judo,Tennis, cycling and dog breeding.The Hall family spend their spare time sewing, drawing and reading.Mr & Mrs Branston read and play tennis.Mrs Branston also goes swimming as do the Hudson family who also water ski and walk.The Clarks enjoy photography ,playing cricket and knitting.The Penny family have more spare time.They swim,fish, walk,knit, go dancing,enjoy gardening and watch sport on T.V. The Chantrells do bell ringing,dress making,painting,shooting and photography. Mr and Mrs Cook play tennis,cricket,music,squash, go to the theatre and also enjoy photography.The Winterton family do gardening, play cricket,read,walk and bird watch.The Mcwhinnies enjoy art,walking,reading, watching sport,cycling and also Morris dancing.The Lazda family cycle,garden, play squash and make wine and beer.
